categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Thanar was a Human male who served as a captain in the Imperial Navy of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. He was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock, where he dispensed gear to soldiers and other agents of the Empire.

Captain Thanar first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Korriban Commendations vendor aboard Vaiken Spacedock; he was later relabeled as the Level 8 Equipment Vendor.
